name: John Smith
title: Chief Technology Officer
persona: Technical Decision Maker - Focuses on scalability, performance, and integration capabilities. Values data-driven solutions and has strong influence over technology purchasing decisions. Prefers detailed technical demonstrations and proof of concepts.
notes: Very technical background with 15+ years in enterprise software. Previously worked at Google and Microsoft. Key influencer in technology decisions. Interested in AI and machine learning applications.

name: Sarah Johnson
title: VP of Digital Transformation
persona: Innovation Champion - Drives digital transformation initiatives within traditional banking environment. Focuses on customer experience improvement and operational efficiency. Strong advocate for modern technology adoption.
notes: Leading the bank's digital transformation initiative. Has budget authority for technology investments. Very interested in customer experience improvements and regulatory compliance solutions.

name: Dr. Michael Chen
title: Chief Medical Officer
persona: Clinical Expert - Medical professional with deep understanding of healthcare workflows and patient care requirements. Values evidence-based solutions and clinical validation. Focuses on patient outcomes and safety.
notes: Former practicing physician with expertise in emergency medicine. Strong advocate for AI in healthcare. Interested in solutions that improve patient outcomes and reduce physician workload.

name: Lisa Rodriguez
title: Director of Operations
persona: Operations Focused - Responsible for day-to-day retail operations across multiple locations. Prioritizes cost efficiency, inventory management, and customer satisfaction. Conservative approach to new technology adoption.
notes: Manages operations for 150+ retail locations. Very cost-conscious and ROI-focused. Needs to see clear operational benefits before considering new solutions. Long evaluation process typical.

name: David Park
title: Head of Product
persona: Product Innovator - Drives product development and user experience improvements. Focuses on learner engagement, content quality, and platform scalability. Open to innovative solutions that enhance learning outcomes.
notes: Existing customer who has been very satisfied with our platform integration. Interested in expanding usage to additional product lines. Strong internal advocate and reference.

name: Robert Thompson
title: Plant Manager
persona: Traditional Manufacturing Leader - Experienced in traditional manufacturing processes with focus on quality, safety, and efficiency. Cautious about new technology adoption but interested in proven solutions that improve operations.
notes: 30+ years in manufacturing industry. Very focused on quality and safety standards. Skeptical of new technology but open to solutions with proven ROI. Requires extensive validation and references.

name: Emily Green
title: Sustainability Director
persona: Sustainability Champion - Passionate about environmental impact and sustainable business practices. Values solutions that align with company's green mission. Influences purchasing decisions based on environmental benefits.
notes: Strong advocate for sustainable technology solutions. Interested in our carbon footprint reduction features. Has influence over technology decisions that align with sustainability goals.

name: James Wilson
title: VP of Technology
persona: Logistics Technology Expert - Focuses on operational efficiency and supply chain optimization. Values solutions that improve tracking, reduce costs, and enhance customer service. Data-driven decision maker.
notes: Responsible for all technology initiatives across the logistics network. Very interested in IoT and tracking solutions. Budget available for solutions that demonstrate clear operational improvements.

name: Maria Garcia
title: VP of Sales
persona: Sales Leader - Drives revenue growth and customer acquisition strategies. Focuses on solutions that improve sales team productivity and customer engagement. Values tools that provide sales insights and automation.
notes: Leads a team of 25 sales professionals. Very interested in CRM and sales automation tools. Looking for solutions to improve sales team efficiency and customer relationship management.

name: Kevin Brown
title: IT Security Manager
persona: Security Gatekeeper - Responsible for evaluating and approving all technology solutions from a security perspective. Highly focused on compliance, data protection, and risk management. Conservative approach to new technology.
notes: Key stakeholder in technology approval process. Very thorough in security evaluations. Requires extensive documentation and compliance certifications. Can block deals if security concerns not addressed.
